name: places/ChIJe_f0xNj3wokR9pHqaVWogNM
formattedAddress: 2256 Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2256 Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd, New York, NY 10027, USA

editorialSummary.text: Gay bar with a dark, intimate vibe offering pizza & wings, plus beer & signature cocktails.

originalText.text: T’was a bit dead on a Sunday night, but I enjoyed my time here. I come for the great music and hookah, they never disappoint. The drinks are always great with friendly bartenders, this night was no exception. A bit pricey but excellent quality and strength. Two doubles and I was good for the night. Usually it’s a guy making the hookah on the weekend and he does an excellent job. This visit it was a younger female and the hookah was weak with not a lot of drag (though the flavor was pleasant). I asked for blueberry mint and she brought me the hookah saying that she added a bit of peach as well (but peach was all I tasted). Probably wouldn’t order hookah again if she’s the one making them, but everything else was great.

originalText.text:
Most unprofessional bar I’ve ever been to. Went to celebrate my friends birthday there recently and we must of spent over $1000 on bottles and drinks. But they proceeded to ban my friend the next day due to their manager having a personal problem with one of my friends. Which only started because my friend wasn’t interested in the manager and he would then mess with him constantly and threaten to kick him out. One of the bartenders also tried to keep $40 of my friends money cause he was too drunk to remember he ordered the two drinks and just started rambling nonsense.

EDIT: Since management wants to continue to be unprofessional let me say the whole story. First of all the issue with the piss was MONTHS ago. So why would you continue to take their money for months afterwards when there was no other issue. Secondly, yes the piss was uncalled for but it was a prank after the bartender was throwing ice at my friend. My friend intended to hand the drink to the bartender but another bartender took it and said he was gonna give it to the worker but ended up drinking it himself. So the big question is why is a bartender drinking something that wasn’t for him anyways? I didn’t include any of this because like I said that situation was months ago and it was not my experience. So no I didn’t embarrass myself. You guys just proved my point on how unprofessional this establishment is.

originalText.text: Lambda was a good time. Good atmosphere, good vibes, very chill, nice seating with smooth content and video games too. Strong drinks. Welcoming crowd. Just what you want to relax

text.text: Lambda was a good time. Good atmosphere, good vibes, very chill, nice seating with smooth content and video games too. Strong drinks. Welcoming crowd. Just what you want to relax

originalText.text:
Went on a Friday night and had a blast. Pleasant crowd, kind bartenders. Expensive drinks. I probably would have purchased more cocktails but $16 for a drink + $2 tip adds up super quickly.

Otherwise. Great music and pretty clean.

Otherwise. Great music and pretty clean.

originalText.text: Super proud of this top notch Black owned business. Drinks were great. Atmosphere was amazing and the service was top notch. Please support this business.

text.text: Super proud of this top notch Black owned business. Drinks were great. Atmosphere was amazing and the service was top notch. Please support this business.
